title: Just saw kai'sa reveal.
body:
there is enough vayne in there for this champion to be annoying. true stealth on basic and %health.

Atleast most of vayne isn't there. no True%health, no free basic move speed towards enemies, no free disengage, and no stuns. of course numbers might be off but the kit itself looks annoying but fine generally.

replies.body:
Not gonna lie, I love her character design and her kit seems extremely fun.
Definitely going to spam her. The first new champion I am interested in since Camilles release.

I talked about this too but they downvoted me here xD
she has some Twich too , the stealth and long range from ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Hikari Sakata,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60XuodAy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-20T17:52:43.543+0000)
>
> I talked about this too but they downvoted me here xD
> she has some Twich too , the stealth and long range from ult.

you get downvoted cause this baords is full of adc mains who wanna abuse this champ too

> [{quoted}](name=Purgë,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60XuodAy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-20T18:18:12.886+0000)
>
> you get downvoted cause this baords is full of adc mains who wanna abuse this champ too

Actually I just saw her abilities in video
I can see  how broken she is , her q high high damage , her w has a very long range and it gives vision , getting hit by it will make her follow you with her Ult to finish you off since it has shields , you can use it to run too 
her e gives a crazy movement speed and stealth , she can't aa but maybe she can use abilities like q ? not sure , but her ult is pretty strong , in other words , she is a mobility adc

> [{quoted}](name=Hikari Sakata,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60XuodAy,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2018-02-20T18:59:23.769+0000)
>
> she is a mobility adc

Not quite, more like a rush down adc. Doesn't have any real disengage mobility, only engage.

> [{quoted}](name=Z3Sleeper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60XuodAy,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2018-02-20T19:06:36.990+0000)
>
> Not quite, more like a rush down adc. Doesn't have any real disengage mobility, only engage.

Her E is actually good for disengaging , it gives her a high movement speed and later it gives stealth , after that she gets attack speed , but you can use those her E then Ult to run away too , like if a Fiora or Zed came to your back lane to kill the carries and you were sent behind somehow or something like that, you can w on the enemy then ult , can be used for many cases , we will know more when we get to play her

> [{quoted}](name=Purgë,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60XuodAy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-20T18:18:12.886+0000)
>
> you get downvoted cause this baords is full of adc mains who wanna abuse this champ too

Exactly !

adc mains and cancer mains.

seriously though there are enough people that I have met that play nearly exclusively things like yasuo riven and vayne that we should quantify them.
Another ADC with stealth. Lmao. When is this shit going to stop?
